M P R S T 

M

mouse.transformed2D - package mouse.transformed2D
 
MouseTransformed - Class in mouse.transformed2D
This is a processing library used to transform the mouse matrix and get the transformed mouse coordinates.
MouseTransformed(PApplet) - Constructor for class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
 
mouseX() - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Calculates the mouse X-coordinate in current matrix (transformed or not).
mouseY() - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Calculates the mouse Y-coordinate in current matrix (transformed or not).

P

popMatrix() - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Pops current transformation matrix off the animation and mouse stack.
popMatrixMouse() - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Pops current transformation matrix off the mouse stack ONLY.
pushMatrix() - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Pushes current transformation matrix onto the animation and mouse stack.
pushMatrixMouse() - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Pushes current transformation matrix onto the mouse stack ONLY.

R

rotate(double) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Rotate current animation and mouse matrices.
rotateMouse(double) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Rotate current animation and mouse matrices.

S

scale(float) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Scale current animation and mouse matrices.
scale(float, float) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Scale current animation and mouse matrices.
scaleMouse(float) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Scale current mouse matrix ONLY.
scaleMouse(float, float) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Scale current mouse matrix ONLY.

T

translate(float, float) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Translate current animation and mouse matrices.
translateMouse(float, float) - Method in class mouse.transformed2D.MouseTransformed
Translate current mouse matrix ONLY.
